name: El Castillo del Dragón
overview: After quite a few months of work, The Dragon's Castle, the last title of Sputnik World, a game that transports us to a world of medieval fantasy, with heroes, dragons, a couple of dice and all the intention to flood with fun in front of your C64, having a good time and enjoying a new adventure. Open the doors of the castle with the sharp sword and blow the dice, which begins our journey to the treasures that hides our odyssey. The game is based on the original that Álvaro Ibañez published in Commodore World magazine in February 1987, in his number 34. Its beginning follows the attempt at its preservation that originated in 2013 in a debate at the Commodore forum for its recovery. It has been reworked and rewritten in assembly. Available worldwide in both Spanish and English.
